description: '''Trần Thị Dung''', better known by her stage name as '''Juky San''' (born 14 January 1998), is a Vietnamese singer. San also participated in [[The Masked Singer Vietnam (season 1)|season 1]] of ''[[The Masked Singer Vietnam]]'' with her character as Chip Chip Pink. In 2025, Juky San joined TV show Say Hi with Queens (Em xinh "say hi").
